text.content: Hello, my name is Ewerton Silva Solitto, I am 20 years old and I am a *Front-end* developer. The main technologies I currently use are *Next.js*, *ReactJS*, *TypeScript*, *TailwindCSS*, *React Native* and *Figma*.

I always strive for quality and performance in my projects, in addition to learning the most sought-after and used technologies in the market. I believe that teamwork and collaboration are essential for a creative and successful process.
If you are interested in my profile, I am available for contact.
